title: Barrack Obama - 2008-03-28 - Pittsburgh Rally
description:
Title: Barrack Obama Campaign Rally at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial
       Hall in Pittsburgh, PA
Date: March 28, 2008

===Description===
U.S. Senator Bob Casey of Pennsylvania endorses Obama, then Obama yaks.

Ripped from campus bandwidth version at http://cmutv.org/.

Transcript: http://www.nytimes.com/2008/03/28/us/politics/28text-casey.html

===Sponsors===
Carnegie Mellon University

===Technicals===
Video Codec: MPEG-4 AVC, 1515 kpbs, 29.97fps, 640x480
Audio Codec: AAC, 2 Channels
Container: MKV, 1:12:07, 781 MiB
Source Chain: MOV container -> mkvmerge

===Notes===
My heart is in the work.

No reencoding took place. There is no quality loss at all.

Tickets for this damn event were gone in like an hour after they were
released.

You may ask "Why did I change containers?" Becuase MKV is a free and
open standard container. The original container was in proprietary
MOV. Plus, I seem to have saved ~60 MiB by changing containers. I never
knew the MOV container had that much overhead.
